pageContent: Purpose of review: Active surveillance is a management strategy for early-stage prostate cancer designed to balance early detection of aggressive disease and overtreatment of indolent disease. We evaluate recently reported outcomes and discuss the potentially most important endpoints for such an approach.

metaData.source:
Sarcosine induces increase in HER2/neu expression in androgen-dependent prostate cancer cells
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21755295/
